```{r}
library(TraMineR)

sim_seqs_TVMC_33 <- read.csv("../Data in use/sim_seqs_TVMC_seed33.csv")[,-1]
colnames(sim_seqs_TVMC_33) <- c(format(seq(as.POSIXct("00:00:00", format = "%T"), as.POSIXct("23:59:00", format = "%T"), by = "1 min"), "%H:%M"))

sim_seqs_TVMC_33[sim_seqs_TVMC_33 == "N/A"] <- NA
seq_costs <- seqcost(seqdef(sim_seqs_TVMC_33), method = "TRATE", with.missing = TRUE)
seq_distances <- seqdist(seqdef(sim_seqs_TVMC_33), method = "OM", 
                         indel = seq_costs$indel, sm = seq_costs$sm, with.missing = TRUE)
```
